summary: Replaces the standard currency for the Brazilian coin, I have no idea why I did that.
descriptionHtml:
[center][heading] HD 1K Brazilian Coin[/heading][/center]
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53338-1-1398296749.png[/img]

[center]If for some reason you want install it, drop the files on data folder. Or use Nexus Mod Manager.[/center]





[center][color=green][ huelanguage ] [/color]Se por algum motivo você quiser instalar isto, jogue na pasta "Data" ou use o Nexus Mod Manager.[/center]





This is my first mod, please tell me if something goes wrong I'll fix.
Está é minha primeira modificação, por favor diga se algo der errado e eu irei corrigir =]


[color=black]GIBE ENDORSE PLS OR I REPORT U[/color]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/OKT9Fd6.jpg[/center][/img]
author: Otker
